import { useState } from "react"; import Carousel from "react-elastic-carousel"; import useFecth from "./usefectch"; const Genre = ({genre}) =>{ const {data:movies, isPending, error, setUrl} = useFecth('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/discover/movie?api_key=05b670c12d1973fe82919a005ef06481&with_genres='+genre.id); const base_url = 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500'; const breakPoints = [ { width: 1, itemsToShow: 1, itemsToScroll:1}, { width: 550, itemsToShow: 2, itemsToScroll:2}, { width: 850, itemsToShow: 3, itemsToScroll:3}, { width: 1150, itemsToShow: 4, itemsToScroll:4}, { width: 1450, itemsToShow: 5, itemsToScroll:5}, { width: 1750, itemsToShow: 6, itemsToScroll:6}, ] const [searchformovie,setSearchForMovie]=useState(''); const handlechange = (event)=>{ setSearchForMovie(event.target.value); } const handleSearch = ()=>{ window.location.href = '/search/'+searchformovie; } return(
{genre.name}

{movies && movies.results.map((movie)=>

{movie.title}

)}
) } export default Genre;
